subject: Respond for your loan approval
body:
Dear Home Owner

Would you like to reduce your mortgage payment?. You loan has been pre-approved.

You can receive $267,000 for 
$595 per month.

Please respond Instantly.
http://ilook.tw/g8ah


Rogelio Donne
Lender Network


Minds are like parachutes. They only function when they are open.	-Sir James Dewar, Scientist (1877-1925)
